name: preoccupation

[ C ] an idea or subject that someone thinks about most of the time: My main preoccupation now is trying to keep life normal for the sake of my two boys.
[ C or U ] the state of being worried about or thinking about something most of the time: Lately, his preoccupation with football had caused his marks at school to slip. Synonyms
alarm (WORRY)
concern (WORRY)
